text:
Travis failure: download time out.

Otherwise, an example using it would be great.

I will commit again to relaunch travis.

> Otherwise, an example using it would be great.

I'm still thinking about that. Any idea is welcome.

One remark on these fetchers: I would like us to start having a name convention for atlases: something like fetch_atlas_foobar. It would help with discovery via tab completion.

Sent from my phone. Please forgive brevity and mis spelling

@lesteve This one is also part of the #HappyMergeDay!

Note: I'm planning to add an example using this atlas and Destrieux's afterward.

You know it's not going to be a #HappyMergeDay when the Travis tests are not even passing ;-).

I guess you need to tweak setup.py so that the missing csv is part of the package_data.
Failing tests: verbose parameter wasn't removed in one of the tests.
Merging, thanks.
